feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking layout update to Player and BreathingCircle files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base plus CSS variables for light/dark themes and global background/foreground tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file loading main.tsx and PWA manifest with favicon.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, colors, orientation, and icons.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router layout with header, tabbed footer navigation, and route configuration.
Animated breathing circle that changes color, text, and timing based on phase state.
frontend/src/components/charts/BreathHol: Draws an SVG line chart of breath-hold durations with scaled points and optional empty-state text.
frontend/src/components/charts/WeeklyMin: Shows a weekly bar chart of minutes with dynamic bar heights and labels.
frontend/src/components/CustomPatternFor: Form for editing custom inhale/hold/exhale durations with numeric inputs.
frontend/src/components/ExerciseTileCard: Clickable exercise card with icon, info button, styling, and keyboard support.
frontend/src/components/HomeExerciseCard: Home screen exercise card with duration dialog, icon, description, and start handler.
frontend/src/components/SessionList.tsx: Renders a table of breathing sessions with formatted dates and durations, or a placeholder when empty.
frontend/src/components/VerticalVolumeCo: Displays a vertical slider wrapped in a styled card to control a numeric volume value.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBreathingEngine.ts: Manages breathing phase timing, transitions, voice cues, haptics, and pause/resume logic for breathing exercises.
frontend/src/hooks/useHaptics.ts: Provides a simple vibration helper using the browser's navigator.vibrate API.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identities, and related status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/usePerExerciseDuratio: Stores and retrieves per‑exercise durations from local storage with default fallbacks.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeLock.ts: Requests and releases screen wake locks based on an active flag with automatic cleanup.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, color variables, fonts, and breathing animation keyframes.
frontend/src/lib/ambientAudio.ts: Controls looping rain and wave audio with volume adjustments and exclusive playback.
frontend/src/lib/breathingPatterns.ts: Defines the BreathingPattern interface and preset breathing patterns with inhale/hold/exhale timings.
frontend/src/lib/localStorageStore.ts: Provides helpers to read and write breath-hold records, breathing sessions, and per-exercise durations in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/playerDurationGuards.ts: Validates session duration inputs and determines when auto-stop is allowed during playback.
frontend/src/lib/sessionTypes.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for breath-hold records and breathing sessions.
frontend/src/lib/statsDerivations.ts: Generates daily minute totals, breath-hold chart data, and returns the latest ten breathing sessions.
frontend/src/lib/storageKeys.ts: Defines constant localStorage keys for session and settings data.
frontend/src/lib/voiceGuidance.ts: Controls speech synthesis volume, speaking, async speaking, and canceling voice guidance.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Displays app information, premium features teaser, and quick settings with navigation.
frontend/src/pages/Custom.tsx: Allows users to build a custom breathing pattern and start a session with it.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Shows preset breathing exercises, configurable durations, and a breath-holding test entry.
frontend/src/pages/Player.tsx: Runs the breathing session player with timing, voice guidance, ambient audio, auto-stop, and session logging.
frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx: Provides UI toggles for audio, haptics, and notification-related settings.
frontend/src/pages/Stats.tsx: Renders the stats dashboard, loading recent breathing sessions and breath-hold data to display charts and a history table.
frontend/src/pages/Test.tsx: Implements a breath-hold timer with start/stop logic, tracking elapsed time and storing new records in local storage.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker on page load to enable basic PWA support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, breakpoints, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Contains the project’s versioned state description, feature list, and high-level summary of the app’s capabilities.
